author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description: Move Sequence to Task for **RecoParticleFlow RecoTracker RecoEgamma** cff python files. (errors fixed)
(An extension of the previous task [PR#25163](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25163), [PR#27474](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27474) , [PR#27640](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27640), [PR#27887](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27887))

Tested in CMSSW_11_0_X_2019_09_15-0000, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Move Sequence to Task for RecoParticleFlow RecoTracker RecoEgamma
